post.author: Kelly Lee
post.content:
SR. WEB SOFTWARE DEVELOPER  
  
Location: Etobicoke, ON  
Job Category: Computers-Internet, Computers-Software  
Industry: Information Technology  
Company URL: http://www.globalrecruit.com  
Year(s) of Experience:  
Date Posted: Mar 1, 2002  
Contact E-mail:  2362wks65281@globalrecruit.com  
  
   Reference: #2362 [Please quote this 薩綬er on all correspondence]
Position: SR. WEB SOFTWARE DEVELOPER  
Type: PERMANENT
Salary: NEGOTIABLE  
Location: ETOBICOKE  
Description: Position:Senior Web Software Developer

Our Client develops software targeted at the Retail
marketplace.
They are currently looking for a Senior Software
Developer.
Design and implement Intranet solutions to drive
business productivity within the corporate office using
Web and Database Technologies
Design and implement Extranet solutions to drive
business productivity among the corporate office, our
clients and partners using Web and Database Technologies
Liaise with internal department managers and
stakeholders in efforts to Web-Enable core business
systems.
Technical Skills Required:
Minimum 4 years of Web development experience using Web
and Database Technologies
Web Server maintenance, and configuration experience
Understanding of Web Security requirements.
Technical knowledge in: HTML, ASP, Perl, CGI, SQL, and
related languages.
Knowledge of Microsoft Web Services (XML, SOAP, UDDI)
with practical experience
Knowledge of Microsoft technical environment
Current technical knowledge in LAN and WAN technologies,
TCP/IP, FTP, DNS, Telnet, etc.
Knowledge of Windows NT/2000, Unix environments
Other Skills Required:
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
Self starter who can work independently with little
supervision under demanding time constraints
Strong troubleshooting, debugging, analytical and
testing skills
Ability to work in a team environment
Position Type: Full-Time
Location: Etobicoke area, near 427



Please email your resume to: 2362wks65281@globalrecruit.com
post.title: SR. WEB SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
